mapper.select: SELECT a.att_num, a.emp_num, e.emp_name, a.go_work, a.leave_work, a.break_time, TRUNC((a.leave_work - a.go_work) * 24) work_time FROM attendance a JOIN emp e ON a.emp_num = e.emp_num order by go_work desc
mapper.insert: insert into attendance(att_num, emp_num, go_work, leave_work) values (attseq.nextval, #{emp_num}, #{go_work}, #{leave_work, jdbcType = DATE})
